mapper.select: select appointment_id, board_id, share_user_id, not_share_user_id, appointment_start, appointment_end, title, type, ( case when (appointment_start > now() and now() >= DATE_SUB(appointment_start, INTERVAL 7 DAY)) then "시작일 임박!" when now() >= DATE_SUB(appointment_end, INTERVAL 7 DAY) then "마감일 임박!" end ) as status from appointment as a left join ask_view as s on s.id = a.board_id where a.state >= 0 and not_share_user_id = #{userId} and ((appointment_start >= now() and now() >= DATE_SUB(appointment_start, INTERVAL 7 DAY)) or now() >= DATE_SUB(appointment_end, INTERVAL 7 DAY));
